name: Beat The Rhythm
description:
- You play as a DJ in a disco who only wants to share her music but some malicious people want to stop you ..
There is only one way to solve this problem and it's by sharing your good vibes with them and by staying in rhythm !

- Move your cursor by doing an action without breaking the rhythm and don't let them come too near.

- This game has been made in 3 days by Charles-Edouard Mounguendé (cf : his book on the external links bellow ) and myself.
_________________________________________

2D Assets / Audio : Charles-Edouard
Integration / Programation : Hugo

Controls :

MOVEArrow Keys - WSADATTACKSpacePAUSEEscape
